001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.disruptor;
002
003import java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory;
004
005import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
006
007import com.lmax.disruptor.EventHandler;
008import com.lmax.disruptor.ExceptionHandler;
009import com.lmax.disruptor.RingBuffer;
010import com.lmax.disruptor.dsl.Disruptor;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.MetaLog;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogAppender;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.AsyncLogPublisher;
017
018/**
019 * Disruptor async publisher.
020 */
021public final class DisruptorLogPublisher implements AsyncLogPublisher {
022
023        private final Disruptor<LogEventCell> disruptor;
024
025        private final RingBuffer<LogEventCell> ringBuffer;
026
027        /**
028         * Creates.
029         * @param appenders appenders.
030         * @param threadFactory thread factory to create writer thread.
031         * @param bufferSize maximum queue elements.
032         * @return publisher.
033         */
034        public static DisruptorLogPublisher of(Iterable<? extends LogAppender> appenders, ThreadFactory threadFactory,
035                        int bufferSize) {
036
037                Disruptor<LogEventCell> disruptor = new Disruptor<>(LogEventCell::new, bufferSize, threadFactory);
038                disruptor.setDefaultExceptionHandler(new LogExceptionHandler(disruptor::shutdown));
039
040                boolean found = false;
041                for (var appender : appenders) {
042                        disruptor.handleEventsWith(new LogEventHandler(appender));
043                        found = true;
044                }
045                if (!found) {
046                        throw new IllegalStateException();
047                }
048                var ringBuffer = disruptor.getRingBuffer();
049
050                var router = new DisruptorLogPublisher(disruptor, ringBuffer);
051                return router;
052        }
053
054        @Override
055        public void start(LogConfig config) {
056                disruptor.start();
057
058        }
059
060        DisruptorLogPublisher(Disruptor<LogEventCell> disruptor, RingBuffer<LogEventCell> ringBuffer) {
061                super();
062                this.disruptor = disruptor;
063                this.ringBuffer = ringBuffer;
064        }
065
066        @Override
067        public void log(LogEvent event) {
068                long sequence = ringBuffer.next();
069                try {
070                        LogEventCell cell = ringBuffer.get(sequence);
071                        cell.event = event;
072                }
073                finally {
074                        ringBuffer.publish(sequence);
075                }
076
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public void close() {
081                this.disruptor.halt();
082        }
083
084        private static class LogEventCell {
085
086                @Nullable
087                LogEvent event;
088
089        }
090
091        private static record LogEventHandler(LogAppender appender) implements EventHandler<LogEventCell> {
092
093                @Override
094                public void onEvent(LogEventCell event, long sequence, boolean endOfBatch) throws Exception {
095                        var logEvent = event.event;
096                        if (logEvent == null) {
097                                return;
098                        }
099                        appender.append(logEvent);
100                }
101
102        }
103
104        private record LogExceptionHandler(Runnable shutdownHook) implements ExceptionHandler<Object> {
105
106                @Override
107                public void handleEventException(Throwable ex, long sequence, Object event) {
108                        if (ex instanceof InterruptedException ie) {
109                                shutdownHook.run();
110                        }
111                        else {
112                                MetaLog.error(DisruptorLogPublisher.class, ex);
113                                throw new RuntimeException(ex);
114                        }
115                }
116
117                @Override
118                public void handleOnStartException(Throwable ex) {
119                        MetaLog.error(DisruptorLogPublisher.class, ex);
120                }
121
122                @Override
123                public void handleOnShutdownException(Throwable ex) {
124                        MetaLog.error(DisruptorLogPublisher.class, ex);
125                }
126
127        }
128
129}
